description: Creates a tag for an EFS resource. You can create tags for EFS file systems and access points using this API operation. This operation requires permissions for the elasticfilesystem:TagResource action.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID specifying the EFS resource that you want to create a tag for.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: An array of Tag objects to add. Each Tag object is a key-value pair. (dict) --- A tag is a key-value pair. Allowed characters are letters, white space, and numbers that can be represented in UTF-8, and the following characters: `` + - = . _ : /``. The tag key (String). The key can't start with aws:. The value of the tag key.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The tag key (String). The key can't start with aws:.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value of the tag key.
